text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
An Umamusume and her trainer are<n>two parts of a whole.
They encourage<n>and support each other to achieve<n>
victory.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The trainer's role is to draw out the<n>full potential of an
Umamusume<n>through rigorous daily practice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
So I need to pull out all the stops for<n>Gold Ship's training in
order for her to<n>seize the win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Heya, Trainer! Hope you're ready to<n>plunder an underwater
temple!
choice_data_list: Whoa, hold on! We're training today.
Whoa, hold on! We're training today.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Huh? You implying that exploring<n>some sunken ruins isn't
training?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: There's ancient splendor in the deep!And you're saying the noble pursuitof the unknown is not training?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well, you'd be absolutely right.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Anywho, it seems like you really<n>wanna practice today. Fret
not, good<n>trainer, I totally get where you're<n>coming from.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
When I say hey, you say ho. I'm the<n>Sherlock to your
Holmes.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We're so close, we don't need silly<n>ol' words to get in the
way! So let's<n>hit the road! Follow meee!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I never thought we'd be on the same<n>page! I'd better hurry
after her to the<n>track!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Now that we're finally at the training<n>course... Wait, this
isn't the track.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaagh! Fish! Fish! Fishin' for fish!<n>What's our catch
gonna be? We're<n>going after the largest—the hugest!<n>It's
big catch or nothing!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Geez, don't just stand there! We're<n>in this together!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Seriously? We came all the way to<n>the waterfront.
Obviously, the only<n>thing we can do is go fishing!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
My poor old pops, the best fisher in<n>the village, retired from
duty before he<n>could ever catch the big granddaddy<n>of this
river...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's why! As his proud daughter,<n>I'm gonna catch that
legend! Arrrgh!<n>Get ready, you jerk fish! I'll get you<n>if it's
the last thing I do!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My head's still reeling from all this,<n>but we cast our lines
into the river.<n>Several minutes later...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
It's no good. The only thing we've<n>caught are stupid water
weeds.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Urrrgh! Aaaagh! I can't take it—I'm<n>about to collapse from
boredom!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Follow me, Trainer! I'm setting our<n>sails for Mars!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This could be good! Maybe she got<n>so bored she finally
wants to start<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, waitress! One grilled fish platter,<n>and pile that rice high!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Pheeew, that was a close call. We got<n>zilch from fishing, but
eating a big one<n>here should make up for it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Enough talk—time to dig in!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mere seconds after her fish platter<n>arrives, she downs the
whole meal in<n>a few gulps...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, just what I needed. I'm<n>eternally grateful for the
existence of<n>sustenance.
choice_data_list: So... can we finally start training?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
What? You mean to tell me fishing for<n>fish and then eating
fish isn't training?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We're living off the land here. It's a<n>struggle for survival,
fraught with<n>danger...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Living in harmony with nature and<n>honing our senses in the
wild—open<n>your eyes. It's all connected to<n>racing!
choice_data_list: Ah, so this is all to train your racing instincts!
Ah, so this is all to train your racing instincts!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Nah, it's probably no help at all!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
In that case, now that I've had a<n>meal, might as well head
over to<n>Golshi Farms and tend the carrots.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Catch you on the other side of the<n>solar system! Farewell!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's out the door by the time I<n>realize we went the entire
day without<n>doing a minute of training...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: An Umamusume and trainer are twoparts of a whole... We're supposed towork together to achieve victory!
